citations.narrative:
In July 2024 one of the facility's adult turkeys was found deceased outside of its primary enclosure. The licensee stated
that the turkeys have their wings clipped regularly and they are unsure how the turkey was able to get out of the
enclosure.
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they contain the birds securely so that they have access
to food, water, and shelter and to prevent attack by predators.
The facility has corrected by making improvements to the turkey enclosure and adjusting the frequency of wing clipping.
Corrected prior to inspection conducted on 06 May 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.153(a)(1)(iii)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
In July 2024 one of the facility's adult turkeys was found deceased outside of its primary enclosure. The licensee stated 
that the turkeys have their wings clipped regularly and they are unsure how the turkey was able to get out of the 
enclosure.  
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that they contain the birds securely so that they have access 
to food, water, and shelter and to prevent attack by predators. 
The facility has corrected by making improvements to the turkey enclosure and adjusting the frequency of wing clipping. 
Corrected prior to inspection conducted on 06 May 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
